shortDescription: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the integrated web server on Siemens SIMATIC S7-1200 CPU devices 2.x and 3.x allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.
vulnerabilityName: Siemens simatic_s7_cpu_1200_firmware Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
